TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Édouard_Ngirente, title = Édouard_Ngirente, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Édouard_Ngirente} }

S.FORM: Édouard Ngirente u siwkay niza u pilecuhan ni Édouard Ngirente i Gakenke District . nalecuhan ciniza i 2 a bulad 22 a demiad 1973 a mihcaan. pahezekay niza i tabakiay a cacudadan nu Rwanda (National University of Rwanda ). micakat u cunli ( Prime Minister) nu Rwanda ayza sa ci Édouard Ngirente , micakat a demiad sa i 2017 a mihcaan 8 a bulad 30 a demiad. u ngangan niza u sulit tu ngangan nu France a kamu:Édouard Ngirente u sulit tu ngangan nu hulam a kamu: u sulit tu ngangan nu Sakizaya a kamu:Mihayiel Misusecin u sapuyaay a kakuniza kakuniza malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan List of current heads of state and government Édouard Ngirente
